```py
>>> x = np.ma.array([[1,2],[3,4]], mask=[1,0,0,1])
>>> x
masked_array(
 data=[[--, 2],
 [3, --]],
 mask=[[ True, False],
 [False,  True]],
 fill_value=999999)
>>> x = x.reshape((4,1))
>>> x
masked_array(
 data=[[--],
 [2],
 [3],
 [--]],
 mask=[[ True],
 [False],
 [False],
 [ True]],
 fill_value=999999) 
```
